review: Have a smartphone, your life just got easier!  If you don't have wifi, I'd question how you're technologically advanced enough to have a smartphone, but more importantly this won't work without it. This thing doesn't have all the same functional apps that AppleTV, but this gizmo is quickly catching up. It takes your TV to a whole new level and is designed to hide pesky wires without needing to run wires through your wall with the power source and HDMI input conveniently close together to plug into the back of your TV.  Keep in mind, your TV needs a USB port to plug it into the back of your TV. Otherwise, you'll need to use the regular plug, with a long wire that comes with the device.
